Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider.handlers

Interface ForgotPasswordHandler

  • public interface ForgotPasswordHandler
    Defines callback to handle to reset user password.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void getResetCode​(ForgotPasswordContinuation continuation)
      A code may be required to confirm and complete the password reset process Supply the new password and the confirmation code - which was sent through email/sms to the continuation
      void onFailure​(java.lang.Exception exception)
      This is called for all fatal errors encountered during the password reset process Probe {@exception} for cause of this failure.
      void onSuccess()
      This is called after successfully setting new password for a user.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        This is called after successfully setting new password for a user. The new password can new be used to authenticate this user.

      • getResetCode

        void getResetCode​(ForgotPasswordContinuation continuation)
        A code may be required to confirm and complete the password reset process Supply the new password and the confirmation code - which was sent through email/sms to the continuation
        Parameters:
        continuation - REQUIRED: Continuation to the next step.

      • onFailure

        void onFailure​(java.lang.Exception exception)
        This is called for all fatal errors encountered during the password reset process Probe {@exception} for cause of this failure.
        Parameters:
        exception - REQUIRED: Contains failure details.
